review: I've had my Chromecast since January 2014. It was working perfectly until today when my TV stopped recognizing it. That would make it seem like maybe it's my TV that's got the issue. Nope. The HDMI ports work fine. I've troubleshooted the hell out of this thing and absolutely nothing has worked. I unplugged it to reboot it. I held the button to reset it. I unplugged my TV. I tried plugging the Chromecast into an external power outlet. I moved the Chromecast to another TV and still the same issue. This thing is now less useful than a paper weight. After spending the better part of this evening trying to get it to work, I think I'll only feel better about this when I hear it being crushed under the tire of my car.
